articles.title: Wild Fork Foods expands with new products, game day deals and 2 new DFW locations opening this year
articles.author: Wild Fork Foods
articles.summary: Wild Fork Foods has expanded its product range, introducing new items like rabbit and white wine sausage, wild boar with cranberry sausage, Häagen-Dazs ice cream, and Italian meats for charcuterie boards. They are also offering special pricing on game day favorites like spare ribs and chipotle barbecue chicken wings. Two new locations in the DFW area are set to open in May and June.

articles.title: Robb Recommends: The Dishwasher-Safe Wine Glasses Michelin-Starred Restaurants Love
articles.author: Justin Fenner
articles.summary: Glasvin, a New York City company, produces handblown crystal wine glasses designed to be lightweight, thin, and dishwasher-safe. Somm.ai, a software platform, helps wine professionals track and analyze sales trends.

articles.title: The price of the Samsung Galaxy A53 5G is free to Rp1.8 million in February 2025!
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nokia is launching the Xplus, a flagship smartphone, featuring a 200MP camera and a 7100mAh battery. The device is expected to have a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED screen with a 120Hz refresh rate, powered by the Exynos 1280 chipset. In addition, the 'SEO Help' plugin enables users to turn YouTube videos into SEO-optimized website content.

articles.title: I Ditched Android's Stock Alarm Clock For This App
articles.author: Yadullah Abidi
articles.summary: AMdroid is presented as an advanced alarm application with features exceeding standard Android alarms. It offers customizable alarm profiles, including wake-up challenges and sleep tracking and promises reliable performance. Switching to AMdroid is suggested for users who need more aggressive alarms and customization.

articles.title: Lululemon's newest bag is already trending — here's why shoppers 'love, love, love it'
articles.author: Katherine Caspersz
articles.summary: Lululemon has launched the Leather Alternative Mini Bag, a versatile bag suitable for day or night. In addition to the bag, the company has released lightweight joggers, a half-zip long sleeve, a water bottle crossbody, leggings in a new color, underwear, an Align tank top, workout shoes, a down-filled jacket, pants, a cami-style dress, a tote bag and a zip jacket.

articles.title: The Coca-Cola Phone And The 9 Weirdest Android Devices Ever Made
articles.summary: Companies like Samsung, Google, Apple, OnePlus, Amazon, Huawei, and Realme produce smartphones. Less conventional brands, such as KFC and Lamborghini, have also released Android devices, including the Lamborghini 88 Tauri. Coca-Cola also released a branded phone.

articles.title: American Standard elevates bathroom experience with M-bidet
articles.summary: American Standard launched the Smart Washer M-bidet, a manual bidet designed to enhance personal hygiene and comfort. The bidet features a side lever enabling users to switch between bidet and posterior cleansing functions.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland shoppers rush to stores as €20 household must-have hits middle aisle
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: LIDL Ireland is launching new cleaning products by Vileda, including the Vileda Spray Mop, Vileda Steam ONE Steam Mop (€49.99), and the Easy Wring and Clean Mop & Bucket Set (€24.99). These products are available for purchase starting February 10 and aim to provide effective and convenient cleaning solutions for various floor types.

articles.title: Thread by @Thomas_Salamus_ on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: The process includes creating a logo on Canva, obtaining 3D renders of the product from Fiverr, building a Shopify store with a free trial, setting up a Meta Ad account, and using tools like SwipeBuilder or Foreplay for ad scouting. The strategy involves spending $50-$100 daily on Meta Ads for two weeks to drive traffic to the website and gauge product demand, aiming for a 'break even' point before investing in inventory.

articles.title: 광주신세계서 구오만두 육즙을 맛보세요
articles.author: 이학수기자
articles.summary: Gwangju Shinsegae introduced a Guomandu pop-up store that is experiencing high customer demand. The store offers meat juice and shrimp juice raw dumplings, which are gaining popularity due to their unique preparation and flavor, having been featured on 'Master of Life'.

articles.title: Why Donald Duck Gets His Own Juice Brand At Dollar Tree
articles.author: Dylan Murray
articles.summary: Citrus World Inc. created Donald Duck juice in 1940, utilizing the popular Disney character as its mascot through licensing agreements. This juice is primarily sold at Dollar Tree locations and remains a popular product even after 84 years.

articles.title: CEO TALK: 'Dare to dream, take risks, and inspire innovation"
articles.author: Jomar Mendoza
articles.summary: Star Drones, under CEO Said Abdul Ghafoor Saif Udeen, has launched TARIQ, Oman's first fully designed and manufactured drone. The company is also planning to build a state-of-the-art drone manufacturing facility in Oman and envisions itself as a global leader in drone innovation, particularly focusing on AI-driven drones and sustainable solutions.

articles.title: Beauty lovers are wild about a dry shampoo FOAM that creates 'double the volume' to make even third day hair look fresh
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: NAVY Hair Care has launched Surge Dry Shampoo and Instant Lift Foam, a foam-based dry shampoo designed to refresh oily hair and provide volume. The product contains ingredients like rice starch, honeysuckle flower extract, and lactic acid, and is free of parabens, sulfates, and other potentially harmful substances. Users report improved volume and the ability to extend time between washes.

articles.title: A better way to buy and read books
articles.author: David Pierce
articles.summary: Nvidia launched its GeForce RTX 5080, a new GPU, now available for $999. Bookshop.org now offers ebooks with a basic but functional app. TGL, a new indoor golf league featuring innovative technology, has also been introduced.

articles.title: New Aldi supermarket being built off A149 in King's Lynn
articles.author: Chris Bishop
articles.summary: Aldi is planning to build a new store in King's Lynn, having obtained planning permission and filed a construction plan. Construction is expected to take a year to complete. The new store represents an expansion of Aldi's retail presence in the area.

articles.title: SEXY photos: Rihanna's BOLD Instagram post goes viral; singer dons blue lingerie from her brand
articles.author: Malayalam
articles.summary: Rihanna unveiled Fenty Skin's new HydraVizor Huez Tinted Moisturizer Mineral with SPF 30. The sunscreen moisturizer is available in 10 different foundation shades.

articles.title: Far Cry New Dawn will receive 60 fps on the consoles »Vortex
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Ubisoft launched a 60 FPS performance upgrade for 'Far Cry New Dawn' on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S, enhancing the visual experience. This upgrade coincided with the game's addition to Xbox Game Pass, increasing its accessibility. This move reflects Ubisoft's commitment to supporting older titles and providing enhanced gaming experiences on newer consoles.

articles.title: 38 Products That'll Keep Your Home The Cleanest It's Ever Been In 2025
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article features a wide range of newly introduced cleaning products available on Amazon, designed for various household tasks.  Products include stain removers (oil, rust, pet urine), cleaning tools (brushes, squeegees, dusters), and cleaning solutions (sprays, gels, pastes) for surfaces like ovens, microwaves, carpets, and windows. Several small businesses and brands like Scrub Daddy, Swiffer, The Pink Stuff, CleaningStudio, Everneat, Microfiber Wholesale, Sunny & Honey are mentioned for their specialized products and cleaning solutions.

articles.title: Is this AI tool capable of creating content that is superior to ChatGPT?
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: AI Magicx, a tool designed for generating creative AI content, is introduced. This product allows users to create up to 250 images, 250 logos, and unlimited words each month. A lifetime subscription is available for $69.99 with code TAKE30.

articles.title: Mums slam H&M over ‘revealing' leather mini skirt for toddlers – even comparing it to Nessa's style from Gavin & Stacey
articles.author: Rhiannon Oliver
articles.summary: H&M is facing criticism for selling a 'mini-skirt' designed for toddlers (18 months to 10 years old). Parents have expressed concerns about the skirt's appropriateness and practicality for young children. Fabulous reached out to H&M, who were unable to comment.

articles.title: 30 Things That'll Make Your Time In The Kitchen Much More Efficient
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article highlights numerous new kitchen products available for purchase on Amazon and Uncommon Goods, including an automatic pan stirrer, garlic presses, electric potato peeler, hand-powered chopper, grape cutter, herb scissors, soap dispensing brush, and "splatypus" spatula.  Other products include magnetic air fryer cheat sheets, scrapers, baking mats, meat thermometers, oven liners, egg separators, jar openers, cutlery brushes, jalapeno corers, slow-cooker liners, kitchen scales, salad tongs, juicers, butter spreaders, cheese slicers, the Chopula, microwave bacon cookers, corn strippers, plant-based cooking oil solidifiers, and microwave rice and quinoa cookers.

articles.title: Pepsi launches a new flavor very similar to the one Coca-Cola withdrew some time ago
articles.summary: Pepsi launched Pepsi Wild Cherry & Cream in regular and zero-sugar options on January 20, featuring a cherry flavor with a creamy vanilla swirl. Coca-Cola introduced Spiced Coca-Cola in the U.S. and Canada on February 19, 2024, which includes a mix of spices and raspberry, available in both regular and zero-sugar options.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra review - a very clever phone that might be too smart for most
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, a new smartphone featuring a 6.9-inch screen, upgraded quad-camera system, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and enhanced battery life. The device introduces Galaxy AI, offering features like integration with Google's Gemini chatbot and improved camera retouching, alongside the One UI 7 update with seven years of software updates.

articles.title: maruti grand vitara 2025
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Maruti Suzuki unveiled the 2025 Grand Vitara, a power-packed SUV. The company designed the SUV to redefine standards of efficiency and technology.

articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Maruti Suzuki unveiled the 2025 Grand Vitara, a power-packed SUV. This model aims to redefine efficiency and technology standards.

articles.summary: Maruti Suzuki unveiled the 2025 Grand Vitara, a new SUV. This SUV is designed to redefine standards of efficiency and technology.

articles.title: Ninja's double air-fryer is at cheapest price ever using a deal stack saving over £100
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Ninja's double-stack air fryer, boasting a 9.5-liter capacity with two drawers, has six cooking functions and can cook up to 55% faster than standard ovens. The air fryer includes accessories like silicone tongs, an apron, and dishwasher-safe drawers, and features a 'Max Crisp' function.

articles.title: 'Idk why people act like it's an all-purpose spray': Woman issues warning for people who use Dawn Powerwash to clean. You're probably using it wrong
articles.author: Jack Alban
articles.summary: Dawn Powerwash is a versatile cleaning product suitable for hard surfaces, kitchen sinks, dishes, grills, laundry stains, make-up brushes, and sneakers, as stated by the manufacturer. However, some users report issues with soapy and sticky residue if not thoroughly rinsed after application, leading to discussions on proper usage.

articles.title: Understanding the benefits of GNBS certification programmes
articles.author: Shervin Media
articles.summary: The Guyana National Bureau of Standards (GNBS) offers several certification programs. These include the Made in Guyana Certification for local manufacturers, Product Certification for locally manufactured products like PVC pipes, and GYS 901 Certification for Micro, Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises, Laboratory certification and Bed and Breakfast certification. These programmes aims to ensure quality and compliance with relevant standards.

articles.title: Reviewers Love These 6 Plush Blankets, And They're Actually Machine-Washable
articles.author: Haley Zovickian
articles.summary: The article reviews several plush blankets from brands such as Bedsure, Eddie Bauer, and Bare Home. These blankets are praised for their softness, washability, and durability. Some blankets, like the Barefoot Dreams blanket, are highlighted for their popularity among celebrities.

articles.title: How Dragon's Den reject turned investment snub into successful haircare brand stocked in Boots and making £6.5m revenue
articles.author: Josie O'Brien
articles.summary: Hair Syrup, a haircare company, experienced significant growth after its founder, Lucie Macleod, appeared on Dragon's Den. Despite not securing investment, the company expanded and launched its products in Boots stores after that show.

articles.title: motorola edge 70 ultra fast charging
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch its new premium smartphone, the Motorola Edge 70 Ultra. This indicates an upcoming product release from the company.

articles.title: motorola edge 70 ultra specifications
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch the Motorola Edge 70 Ultra, its latest premium smartphone.

articles.title: motorola edge 70 ultra all details
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch its newest high-end smartphone, the Motorola Edge 70 Ultra.

articles.title: motorola edge 70 ultra 6000mah battery
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch the Motorola Edge 70 Ultra, its newest premium smartphone. The launch indicates the introduction of a new product from Motorola.

articles.title: motorola edge 70 ultra display
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch the Motorola Edge 70 Ultra, their latest premium smartphone. This indicates a new product introduction by Motorola.

articles.title: motorola edge 70 ultra processor
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch the Motorola Edge 70 Ultra, a new premium smartphone.

articles.title: First Batch Of Fremont-Manufactured ‘Juniper' Model Y Arrives At Tesla Stores
articles.author: Whitney Bruno
articles.summary: Tesla's new Model Y Juniper, manufactured in Fremont, has arrived at U.S. stores, including the North Hollywood location. The updated Model Y features a Cybertruck-inspired design, a revamped interior with a redesigned dashboard and premium center console, and higher-quality materials throughout the cabin. Deliveries to customers are expected to begin in March.

articles.title: Is thin the new fold when it comes to smartphones?
articles.author: Mat Gallagher
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the Galaxy S25 Edge, a thinner model than the S25 Ultra with a reduced feature set. Oppo plans to release the Find N5, which will be their thinnest foldable phone to date. Apple is rumored to release an Air model as part of its iPhone 17 range, offering a slim and lightweight option.

articles.title: In its current form, OpenAI's Operator is more of an intriguing demo than a product useful for most people, but it points to a future of powerful AI agents (Kevin Roose/New York Times)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: OpenAI's 'Operator' tool recently demonstrated its capabilities by ordering an ice cream scoop on Amazon. This showcases the potential of powerful AI agents to perform tasks for users.

articles.title: 26 Target Products That'll Make You So Much Happier With How Your Home Looks
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Target and Our Place are introducing new products for home decor and everyday living. Target features items like bath bundles, recipe journals, accent chairs, and smart speakers. Our Place highlights its Always Pan 2.0 with features like nonstick surface, steam-release lid, and a nesting beechwood spatula.

articles.title: How helpful is Operator, OpenAI's new AI agent?
articles.author: NYT News Service
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Operator, a new AI agent available to ChatGPT Pro subscribers, on January 23. This "research preview" allows users to direct an AI agent that can use a web browser and fill out forms to perform tasks on their behalf. While Operator can autonomously complete tasks like ordering items on Amazon and scheduling appointments, it has limitations and requires user supervision.

articles.title: M-KOPA Ghana unveils X Series smartphones with unique benefits
articles.summary: M-KOPA Ghana has launched its new M-KOPA X Series smartphones, including the X20 and X2, in Ghana on January 30, 2025. Developed in partnership with HMD, the X Series offers features like medical health insurance, life insurance, free data of up to 12GB over 12 months and a subsidized screen replacement to provide affordable digital access to everyday earners.

articles.title: ARTHUR GOLDSTUCK: From MG to Huawei, China startles SA market
articles.author: ARTHUR GOLDSTUCK
articles.summary: MG, under its Chinese owners SAIC, launched the MG ZS, a compact crossover SUV, in South Africa. The MG ZS features an eight-inch touchscreen infotainment system and sells for R289,900.

articles.title: Amazon is offering massive £450 discount on 'solid' Google Pixel 8 Pro mobile
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a £450 discount on the Google Pixel 8 Pro, reducing the price to £549.99. The Pixel 8 Pro features a 6.7-inch display, enhanced battery life, updated pro-level cameras, Google AI-powered features like Audio Magic Eraser, and the new Google Tensor G3 chip for improved performance and includes features like Live Translate. It has received positive customer reviews for its camera quality and overall performance.

articles.title: Revlon styler gave me a salon-bouncy blowout - now it's on sale
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Revlon has introduced the One-Step™ Blow-Dry Multi Air Styler 5-in-1, a multitasking hair styling tool with five attachments. Priced at £59.99 on Amazon (reduced from £79.99), it aims to rival Dyson's Airwrap and Shark's Flex-Style, offering a range of styles including curls, volume, and smoothness.

articles.title: Good-looking Suzuki Fronx a comfortable ride that's big on value
articles.author: Jacques Van Der Westhuyzen
articles.summary: Suzuki has launched the Fronx, a new crossover that combines SUV and coupe elements. The Fronx features a 1.5-liter engine, claims fuel efficiency of 5.5 litres per 100km, and includes modern features such as wireless Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and safety features like six airbags and hill hold control. The Suzuki Fronx GLX comes standard with five-year/200 000km warranty and four-year/60 000km service plan.

articles.title: LG Electronics Launches StandbyME 2, Upgrading Portable Lifestyle Screens
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: LG Electronics launched the LG StandbyME 2 in the domestic market, the first major update to its lifestyle screen series in four years. The new model features a detachable 27-inch QHD screen, an improved moving-wheel system, versatile viewing angles, and a high-capacity battery providing up to four hours of use. Equipped with the Alpha 8 AI processor, the StandbyME 2 optimizes video and audio quality.

articles.title: Alibaba Named Most Admired Chinese Internet Firm by Fortune Amid Race with DeepSeek
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Alibaba Cloud has launched Qwen 2.5-Max, a new AI model designed to outperform DeepSeek's V3. Dr. Mei Lin, Head of AI Research at Alibaba Cloud, stated that Qwen 2.5-Max builds upon the existing Qwen model, enhancing performance across natural language understanding, text generation, and reasoning. The company aims to make AI accessible and beneficial for a wide range of applications.

articles.title: GeForce RTX 40 series owners are getting a feature previously exclusive to RTX 50 cards
articles.author: Simon Batt
articles.summary: Nvidia is planning to bring its new 'Smooth Motion' driver technology, initially launched with the RTX 50 series GPUs, to the RTX 40 series as well. This feature, an equivalent to AMD's fluid motion tech, is currently undergoing validation and QA before being released for the older generation of cards via a future update.

articles.title: Gtext Holdings Goes Digital, Announces New Innovations
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Gtext Holdings has launched a digital platform for its subsidiaries, Gtext Lands and Homes. The platform is part of Gtext's mission to revolutionise the real estate sector. The new service provides new opportunities for Gtext holdings.

articles.title: Hyundai Creta: The SUV That Takes Your Driving Experience to the Next Level
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Hyundai Creta is innovating the SUV segment with a focus on comfort and style. The vehicle combines modern technology, performance, and thoughtful features for an enhanced driving experience.

articles.title: How helpful is operator, OpenAI's new AI agent?
articles.author: New York Times
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Operator, a new AI agent, on January 23. This tool, available to ChatGPT Pro subscribers, can use a web browser and fill out forms to perform tasks like ordering items on Amazon and scheduling appointments. While Operator demonstrates potential, its current limitations and need for supervision make it more of an intriguing demo than a fully recommended product.

articles.title: 40 Things You Can Buy Online That Are So Amazing, You'll Wanna Hug Your Mailbox
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article highlights various new products and services. Crew Bottle offers an innovative design for infusing liquids; Billie provides a razor subscription service; Atlas Coffee Club delivers coffee from around the world; Glossier introduces Solution, a chemical exfoliator; KiwiCo offers a bath bomb-making kit; and Creations by Aman features a lip balm keychain kit, Swooc Games features inflatable bull chipper, Friendsheep offers Soot sprite dryer balls, YouCopia introduces Plastic bag dispenser, all providing unique solutions to everyday needs. Material offers sustainable cutting board.

articles.title: Why Samsung's latest Ultra can claim to be the best android available right now
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, featuring updated software with Google AI integration, improved design, and a more efficient processor. While the hardware is similar to the S24 Ultra, the new model offers a refined user experience and a refreshed look, making it a credible Android option.

articles.title: Why Samsung's latest Ultra can claim to be the best android available right now
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Ultra, a new smartphone featuring enhanced software, Google AI integration, and a refined design. While hardware is similar to the S24 Ultra with minor tweaks, the S25 Ultra introduces a new rounded design and improved processor efficiency, making it a notable upgrade.

articles.title: Why Samsung's latest Ultra can claim to be the best android available right now
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Samsung's S25 features an improved camera setup with impressive zoom capabilities and AI upscaling. The phone integrates Google's Gemini as a main assistant, enhancing functionality through voice and text queries and providing access to various apps and services. Samsung has also added 'AI Select', offering context-aware actions for selected screen content, such as turning videos into GIFs or setting pictures as wallpapers.

articles.title: Huawei nova 13 Series offers AI-powered photography and more
articles.author: Marlet Salazar
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the nova 13 Series in the Philippines, featuring enhanced portrait photography capabilities with AI tools and fast-charging features. The series includes the nova 13 Pro, nova 13, and nova 13i models, each with unique pricing and free bundled products like the Huawei Watch GT 4 and FreeBuds SE 2. The phones are available through various online and physical stores, including Shopee, Lazada, TikTok, and Huawei Experience Stores nationwide.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 pre-order - Another retailer gives fans chance to bag Switch 2 at launch
articles.author: Liam Martin
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2 is anticipated to be released soon, featuring a larger screen and redesigned JoyCons with improved technology. A UK retailer, Currys, is offering customers a chance to register for pre-order updates. Leaks indicate that a new Mario Kart game is also in development.

articles.title: Czechs, Lidl dramatically cheapened Powerbank Parkside! Is durable and has an integrated lamp
articles.author: Michal Novotný
articles.summary: Lidl has released the Parkside PPB 20000 A1 power bank, featuring a 20,000 mAh capacity, fast charging via Power Delivery 3.0, and dual USB-C ports. It also includes a built-in LED lamp and IPX4 splash resistance, priced at 399 CZK. Reviewer Michal Novotný confirms the fast charging capabilities and considers it a compelling package for the price, despite its weight.

articles.title: Nicole Kidman's Daughter Sunday Rose Is Stepping Up Her Modeling Game After Making Her Runway Debut
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: SEO Help, a new WordPress plugin, launched to help content creators optimize content. The plugin integrates AI-powered tools, like a Smart Content Generator, to streamline workflows and boost search engine optimization. SEO Help's mission is to make SEO-optimized content accessible to everyone.

articles.title: (EDITORIAL from Korea Times on Feb. 3)
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: DeepSeek launched its new R1 chatbot last week. The debut marks a significant event.

articles.title: Raspberry Pi Focuses on Nigerian Market, Showcases Tech Products
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Raspberry Pi launched its first product in 2012 and followed with subsequent launches across different market segments. The company recently showcased its various products in Lagos.

articles.title: Sunday Drive: The 2025 Kia Sorento Hybrid AWD
articles.author: Provo Daily Herald
articles.summary: KIA introduced an all-new vehicle. The new vehicle is the subject of a great experience.
